snippet: Playing in the closing minutes of a tight game for the first time in a while, Mirza Teletovic’s 10 points in a career-high 22 minutes helped Brooklyn beat Toronto at Barclays Center.
abstract: Brooklyn Nets beat Toronto Raptors, 113-106; Nets forward Mirza Teletovic adds key rebounds, assists and defensive presence late in game in career-high 22 minutes.
lead_paragraph: Playing in the closing minutes of a tight game for the first time in a while, Mirza Teletovic’s 10 points in a career-high 22 minutes helped Brooklyn beat Toronto at Barclays Center.

headline.print_headline: Reserve Makes Himself Heard in Helping Nets Win Seventh Straight
headline.seo: Mirza Teletovic Helps Nets to Seventh Straight Victory
headline.main: Reserve Makes Himself Heard in Helping Nets Win Seventh Straight
